roleset.name: to walk clumsily
roleset.note: WADDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'waddle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from waddle.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Embedded [*-2] in the `` budget '' being concocted [*]by the House-Senate conference committee is [*T*-1] something that [*T*-3] looks , smells and waddles like a duck .
